frame.subtitle: All-in-one easy payments
frame.description: PingGate is a pay-to-message platform that lets experts, creators, and professionals monetize their time and attention. Users pay to start conversations, request services, book consultations, or simply start avoiding spam, all wallet-to-wallet, with built-in reviews and XMTP messaging
frame.ogDescription: Get paid to receive messages. Offer consulting, mentorship, or support through direct, wallet-based chats using XMTP (end to end encrypted)
